Charlie and I send our deepest condolences to the family, loved ones, and staff of Senator Dianne Feinstein.

She was a remarkable woman, an icon, and a trailblazer for women in politics, being the longest serving female senator in history.

Dianne was someone I greatly admired for her good faith negotiating, effective problem solving, and unfailingly kind spirit. She was the picture of a dedicated public servant, and I wish we could have had our last female senators dinner together.

It was a privilege to serve with her and she will be missed, but she will be remembered for her trailblazing, courageous life.
